definitions.text: a vertical structural member as a post or stake
examples: the ball sailed between the uprights

definitions.text: at right angles to the plane of the horizon or a base line
examples: the monument consists of two vertical pillars supporting a horizontal slab

definitions.text: relating to or involving all stages of a business from production to distribution

examples: for a dog, an erect tail indicates aggression
a column still vertical amid the ruins

definitions.text: of or relating to different levels in a hierarchy (as levels of social class or income group)
